description.value: This is meant to capture task start dates that are created from a project template. Tasks coming from a template use estimated duration. This flow utilizes estimated duration in the calc rather than duration which is null during template creation
description.display_value: This is meant to capture task start dates that are created from a project template. Tasks coming from a template use estimated duration. This flow utilizes estimated duration in the calc rather than duration which is null during template creation
